00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/lambda_support.hpp"
00013 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00014 
00015 // these are needed regardless of BOOST_TT_NO_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC 
00016 #if defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION)
00017 namespace boost { namespace detail {
00018 template< typename T > struct remove_const_impl     { typedef T type; };
00019 template< typename T > struct remove_volatile_impl  { typedef T type; };
00020 template< typename T > struct remove_pointer_impl   { typedef T type; };
00021 template< typename T > struct remove_reference_impl { typedef T type; };
00022 typedef int invoke_BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC_outside_all_namespaces;
00023 }}
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 // agurt, 27/jun/03: disable the workaround if user defined 
00027 // BOOST_TT_NO_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC
00028 #if    !defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION) \
00029     || defined(BOOST_TT_NO_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC)
00030 
00031 #   define BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(T) 
00032 
00033 #else
00034 
00035 // same as BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1 macro, except that it
00036 // never gets #undef-ined
00037 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(trait,spec,result) \
00038 template<> struct trait##_impl<spec> \
00039 { \
00040     typedef result type; \
00041 }; \
00042 
00043 
00044 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_CONST_VOLATILE_RANK1_SPEC(T)                         \
00045     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_const,T const,T)                    \
00046     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_const,T const volatile,T volatile)  \
00047     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_volatile,T volatile,T)              \
00048     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_volatile,T const volatile,T const)  \
00049     
00050 
00051 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_1_SPEC(T)                               \
00052     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_pointer,T*,T)                       \
00053     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_pointer,T*const,T)                  \
00054     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_pointer,T*volatile,T)               \
00055     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_pointer,T*const volatile,T)         \
00056     BOOST_TT_AUX_BROKEN_TYPE_TRAIT_SPEC1(remove_reference,T&,T)                     \
00057     
00058 
00059 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_2_SPEC(T)                               \
00060     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_1_SPEC(T)                                      \
00061     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_1_SPEC(T const)                                \
00062     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_1_SPEC(T volatile)                             \
00063     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_1_SPEC(T const volatile)                       \
00064     
00065 
00066 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T)                                   \
00067     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_PTR_REF_RANK_2_SPEC(T)                                      \
00068     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_CONST_VOLATILE_RANK1_SPEC(T)                                \
00069     
00070 
00071 #   define BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T)                                   \
00072     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T*)                                         \
00073     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T const*)                                   \
00074     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T volatile*)                                \
00075     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T const volatile*)                          \
00076     
00077 
00078 #   define BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(T)                                         \
00079     namespace boost { namespace detail {                                            \
00080     typedef invoke_BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC_outside_all_namespaces             \
00081       please_invoke_BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC_outside_all_namespaces;           \
00082     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_1_SPEC(T)                                          \
00083     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T)                                          \
00084     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T*)                                         \
00085     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T const*)                                   \
00086     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T volatile*)                                \
00087     BOOST_TT_AUX_REMOVE_ALL_RANK_2_SPEC(T const volatile*)                          \
00088     }}                                                                              \
00089     
00090 
00091 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/type_trait_undef.hpp"
00092 
00093 #endif // BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION

00095 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(bool)
00096 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(char)

00098 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(wchar_t)
00099 #endif

00105 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(unsigned int)
00106 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(signed long)
00107 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(unsigned long)
00108 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(float)
00109 BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(double)

00113 #define BOOST_BROKEN_COMPILER_TYPE_TRAITS_SPECIALIZATION(T) \
00114     BOOST_TT_BROKEN_COMPILER_SPEC(T) \
